diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy with myelin folding and juvenile onset glaucoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Three patients from a family exhibited symptoms of hereditary motor and sensory neuropathy (HMSN) characterized by juvenile onset and open-angle glaucoma, with significant pathologic findings of myelin abnormalities observed. Genetic analysis suggested autosomal recessive inheritance, with the possibility of linkage to chromosome 11q23. The presence of early childhood onset sensory and motor neuropathy, alongside abnormal myelin folding, supported the diagnosis.
